## Self powers

The series, $1^1 + 2^2 + 3^3 + ... + 10^{10} = 10405071317$

Find the last ten digits of the series, $1^1 + 2^2 + 3^3 + ... + 10^{1000}$.

OEIS Sequence: [A000290](https://oeis.org/A000290)

## Solution
```{r}
library(microbenchmark)
```
```{r}
compute <- function(n) {
    result <- 0
    for (i in 1:n) {
        n <- i
        for (j in 2:i) {
            n <- (n * i) %% 10 ^ 10
        }
        result <- result + n
    }
    return(result %% 10 ^ 10)
}
```
```{r}
compute(10)
```
```{r}
compute(1000)
```
```{r}
microbenchmark(compute(1000))
```
